mapper.select: SELECT UserInfo.UserID,Sex,TrueName,RoleID as RoleIDs, PassWord, WorkSpace, CardID, Sex, Duty, SectionID, SchoolID, TeacherID, DegreeID, SpecialtyID, GraduateTime, Email, MobileTel, Tel, CreateTime, LastEnterTime, StartYear, IsComplete, IsAdmin, FLability, Comability, DipState, DipTakeTo, PersonSpecialtyID, DiplomaNum, OverTime, TtpName, HosID, RYSJ, XNJB, PYNX, JYZSBH, SZKS, BZPX, CSNY, Marry, MZ, ZZMM, JKZK, JWBS, xueli, ISFresh, Fllevel, YB, zyzbh, zydd, zyfw, byzsbh, syd, lcjnkhfs, JSLB, ZYYSZGZ, getDateOfZGZ, ZYYSZCZ, areaOfZY, DocTemp, IsUser, Tec, No, workNo, workLevel, WorkCardNo, XWZUrl, ZYYSZUrl, GPHGZUrl, YSZGUrl, OtherUrl FROM UserInfo inner join UserRole on UserRole.UserID = UserInfo.UserID WHERE UserName = #{userCode} AND RoleID = #{roleId}
